overview: 1230 Hopewell Road centers around two investigate journalist who set out to make a documentary of a local urban legend and a troubled boyfriend at the deadly center of it all.  Rob Gabe is the director of films such as RETURN HAUNED (2021) & MARA'S LABYRINTH (2021) as well as art videos like VIXEN.  Director Statement:  1230 HOPEWELL ROAD is very much inspired by kink/fetish industrial subcultures, film such as Shinya Tsukamoto’s Tetsuo The Iron Man (1988), analogue aesthetics, and Urban Legends I grew up with as a teenager in Chester County, Pennsylvania. It’s pretty edgelord-y and tampers with dork sided subjects so don’t watch it with Mama-San in the room.
title: 1230 Hopewell Road
